title: "Artificial visual system of record-low energy consumption for the next generation of AI"
excerpt: "Researchers have built an ultralow-power consumption artificial visual system to mimic the human brain, which successfully performed data-intensive cognitive tasks. Their experiment results could provide a promising device system for the next generation of artificial intelligence (AI) applications."
